main event: A white stationary object was observed in Shrewsbury, New Jersey, on August 8, 1958.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 5 minutes., The object was reported to be white and at an estimated altitude of 10,000-15,000 feet., It was not moving during the observation., The light of the object went out while being observed., Observers included an electronics engineer from Ft. Monmouth, NJ.
witness description: an electronics engineer from Ft. Monmouth, NJ
